at-rule-empty-line-before.name: at-rule-empty-line-before
at-rule-empty-line-before.description: 要求在@规则之前必须有空行

declaration-bang-space-after.name: declaration-bang-space-after
declaration-bang-space-after.badExample:
a { color: #000 ! important; } 
a { color: #000! important; }

at-rule-name-newline-after.name: at-rule-name-newline-after
at-rule-name-newline-after.description: 具有多行参数时，@规则名之后必须有一个换行符

at-rule-name-space-after.name: at-rule-name-space-after
at-rule-name-space-after.description: 要求在@规则名之后必须有一个空格

at-rule-no-unknown.name: at-rule-no-unknown
at-rule-no-unknown.description: 禁止未知的@规则名称,但为了兼容 scss、less 等预处理器，排除一些特殊字段

at-rule-semicolon-newline-after.name: at-rule-semicolon-newline-after
at-rule-semicolon-newline-after.description: 要求在@规则的分号之后必须有换行符

at-rule-semicolon-space-before.name: at-rule-semicolon-space-before
at-rule-semicolon-space-before.description: 要求在@规则的分号之前禁止有空白符

block-closing-brace-empty-line-before.name: block-closing-brace-empty-line-before
block-closing-brace-empty-line-before.description: 禁止在大括号关闭之前有空行

block-closing-brace-newline-after.name: block-closing-brace-newline-after
block-closing-brace-newline-after.description: 在块的右大括号关闭后必须有一个换行符

block-closing-brace-newline-before.name: block-closing-brace-newline-before
block-closing-brace-newline-before.description: 在块的大括号关闭前必须有一个换行符

block-opening-brace-newline-after.name: block-opening-brace-newline-after
block-opening-brace-newline-after.description: 在块的左大括号之后必须有换行符

color-hex-case.name: color-hex-case
color-hex-case.description: 十六进制颜色必须为小写格式

color-hex-length.name: color-hex-length
color-hex-length.description: 十六进制颜色必须为简写格式

color-no-invalid-hex.name: color-no-invalid-hex
color-no-invalid-hex.description: 禁止使用无效的十六进制颜色

comment-empty-line-before.name: comment-empty-line-before
comment-empty-line-before.description: 在注释之前必须有空行

comment-whitespace-inside.name: comment-whitespace-inside
comment-whitespace-inside.description: 注释内必须留有一个空格

comment-word-blacklist.name: comment-word-blacklist
comment-word-blacklist.description: 禁止出现在注释中的单词的黑名单

declaration-bang-space-before.name: declaration-bang-space-before
declaration-bang-space-before.description: bang声明之前必须有一个空格

declaration-block-no-duplicate-propertie.name: declaration-block-no-duplicate-properties
declaration-block-no-duplicate-propertie.description: 在声明的块中禁止出现重复的属性
declaration-block-no-duplicate-propertie.badExample:
a { color: #000; color: orange; }
a { color: #000; background: orange; color: orange }
declaration-block-no-duplicate-propertie.goodExample:
a { color: #000; }
a { color: #000; background: orange; }

declaration-block-no-#000undant-longhand.name: declaration-block-no-#000undant-longhand-properties
declaration-block-no-#000undant-longhand.description: 禁止使用可以缩写却不缩写的属性

declaration-block-no-shorthand-property-.name: declaration-block-no-shorthand-property-overrides
declaration-block-no-shorthand-property-.description: 禁止简写属性覆盖相关的扩写属性

declaration-block-semicolon-newline-befo.name: declaration-block-semicolon-newline-before
declaration-block-semicolon-newline-befo.description: 在声明块的分号之前禁止有一个换行符

declaration-block-semicolon-space-after.name: declaration-block-semicolon-space-after
declaration-block-semicolon-space-after.description: 要求在声明块的分号之后必须有一个空格

declaration-block-semicolon-space-before.name: declaration-block-semicolon-space-before
declaration-block-semicolon-space-before.description: 要求在声明块的分号之前禁止空格

declaration-block-single-line-max-declar.name: declaration-block-single-line-max-declarations
declaration-block-single-line-max-declar.description: 限制一个单行声明块中声明数量为1

declaration-block-trailing-semicolon.name: declaration-block-trailing-semicolon
declaration-block-trailing-semicolon.description: 声明块内必须有尾随分号

declaration-colon-newline-after.name: declaration-colon-newline-after
declaration-colon-newline-after.description: 如果声明的值是多行，则冒号之后必须有换行符

declaration-colon-space-after.name: declaration-colon-space-after
declaration-colon-space-after.description: 单行冒号声明后必须有一个空格

declaration-colon-space-before.name: declaration-colon-space-before
declaration-colon-space-before.description: 单行冒号声明前禁止空格

declaration-property-value-blacklist.name: declaration-property-value-blacklist
declaration-property-value-blacklist.description: 指定声明内禁止用的属性和值对的黑名单
declaration-property-value-blacklist.goodExample:
a { position: relative; }
a { transform: scale(2); }

font-family-name-quotes.name: font-family-name-quotes
font-family-name-quotes.description: 指定字体名称当推荐使用引号时再使用引号

font-family-no-duplicate-names.name: font-family-no-duplicate-names
font-family-no-duplicate-names.description: 禁止使用重复的字体名称

font-family-no-missing-generic-family-ke.name: font-family-no-missing-generic-family-keyword
font-family-no-missing-generic-family-ke.description: 禁止在字体系列名称列表中缺少通用系列
font-family-no-missing-generic-family-ke.badExample: a { font-family: Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, Tahoma; }
font-family-no-missing-generic-family-ke.goodExample: a { font-family: Helvetica, Arial, Verdana, Tahoma, sans-serif; }

font-weight-notation.name: font-weight-notation
font-weight-notation.description: 当有效的关键字（normal、bold、bolder 和 lighter）可用时，font-weight 的值必须是关键字
font-weight-notation.badExample:
a { font-weight: 700; }
a { font: italic 400 20px sans-serif; }
font-weight-notation.goodExample:
a { font-weight: bold; }
a { font: italic normal 20px sans-serif; }

function-calc-no-invalid.name: function-calc-no-invalid
function-calc-no-invalid.description: 禁止在 `calc` 函数内使用无效的表达式

function-calc-no-unspaced-operator.name: function-calc-no-unspaced-operator
function-calc-no-unspaced-operator.description: 禁止在 `calc` 函数内使用不加空格的操作符
function-calc-no-unspaced-operator.badExample:
a { top: calc(1px+2px); }
a { top: calc(1px+ 2px); }
function-calc-no-unspaced-operator.goodExample:
a { top: calc(1px + 2px); }
a { top: calc(calc(1em * 2) / 3); }

function-comma-newline-after.name: function-comma-newline-after
function-comma-newline-after.description: 在多行函数的逗号之后禁止有一个空白符
function-comma-newline-after.goodExample:
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
a { transform: translate(1 , 1) }

function-comma-newline-before.name: function-comma-newline-before
function-comma-newline-before.description: 在多行函数的逗号之前禁止有一个空白符
function-comma-newline-before.goodExample:
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
a { transform: translate(1 , 1) }

function-comma-space-after.name: function-comma-space-after
function-comma-space-after.description: 在单行函数的逗号之后必须有一个空格
function-comma-space-after.badExample:
a { transform: translate(1,1) }
a { transform: translate(1 ,1) }

function-linear-gradient-no-nonstandard-.name: function-linear-gradient-no-nonstandard-direction
function-linear-gradient-no-nonstandard-.description: 禁止在 linear-gradient() 中调用不符合标准语法的无效方向值。

function-max-empty-lines.name: function-max-empty-lines
function-max-empty-lines.description: 限制函数中相邻空行的数量为0

function-parentheses-newline-inside.name: function-parentheses-newline-inside
function-parentheses-newline-inside.description: 要求在函数的括号内侧必须有换行符
function-parentheses-newline-inside.goodExample:
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }

function-parentheses-space-inside.name: function-parentheses-space-inside
function-parentheses-space-inside.description: 要求在函数的括号内侧禁止有空白符
function-parentheses-space-inside.badExample:
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }

function-url-no-scheme-relative.name: function-url-no-scheme-relative

function-whitespace-after.name: function-whitespace-after
function-whitespace-after.description: 在函数之后必须有空白符

indentation.name: indentation
indentation.description: 始终将@规则、规则、注释、声明、括号内和多行值按两个空格缩进

keyframes-name-pattern.name: keyframes-name-pattern
keyframes-name-pattern.description: 指定关键帧名称的模式

length-zero-no-unit.name: length-zero-no-unit
length-zero-no-unit.description: 禁止零长度的单位（长度单位是：em、ex、ch、vw、vh、cm、mm、in、pt、pc、px、rem、vmin 和 vmax）
length-zero-no-unit.goodExample:
a { top: 0 } /* 没有单位 */
a { transition-delay: 0s; } /* 尺寸 */

linebreaks.name: linebreaks
linebreaks.description: 换行符必须始终为 LF（\n）

max-nesting-depth.name: max-nesting-depth
max-nesting-depth.description: 限制允许嵌套的深度为5（除了伪类选择器）

media-feature-colon-space-after.name: media-feature-colon-space-after
media-feature-colon-space-after.description: 在 media 媒体功能的冒号之后必须有一个空格

media-feature-colon-space-before.name: media-feature-colon-space-before
media-feature-colon-space-before.description: 在 media 媒体功能的冒号之前禁止出现空格

media-feature-name-case.name: media-feature-name-case
media-feature-name-case.description: 指定 media 媒体功能名称必须为小写格式

media-feature-name-no-unknown.name: media-feature-name-no-unknown
media-feature-name-no-unknown.description: 禁止出现未知的媒体特性名称

media-feature-name-no-vendor-prefix.name: media-feature-name-no-vendor-prefix
media-feature-name-no-vendor-prefix.description: 禁止 media 特性名称带有浏览器引擎前缀

media-feature-parentheses-space-inside.name: media-feature-parentheses-space-inside
media-feature-parentheses-space-inside.description: media 媒体功能 的括号内侧禁止出现空白符

media-feature-range-operator-space-after.name: media-feature-range-operator-space-after
media-feature-range-operator-space-after.description: media 媒体功能的范围运算符之后必须有一个空格

media-feature-range-operator-space-befor.name: media-feature-range-operator-space-before
media-feature-range-operator-space-befor.description: media 媒体功能的范围运算符之前必须有一个空格

media-query-list-comma-newline-after.name: media-query-list-comma-newline-after
media-query-list-comma-newline-after.description: media 媒体功能的列表的逗号之后必须有一个换行符

media-query-list-comma-newline-before.name: media-query-list-comma-newline-before
media-query-list-comma-newline-before.description: media 媒体功能的列表的逗号之前禁止有空白符

media-query-list-comma-space-after.name: media-query-list-comma-space-after
media-query-list-comma-space-after.description: media 媒体查询列表的逗号之后必须有一个空格

media-query-list-comma-space-before.name: media-query-list-comma-space-before
media-query-list-comma-space-before.description: media 媒体查询列表的逗号之前禁止有空白符

no-descending-specificity.name: no-descending-specificity
no-descending-specificity.description: 禁止在具有较高优先级的选择器后出现被其覆盖的较低优先级的选择器

no-duplicate-at-import-rules.name: no-duplicate-at-import-rules
no-duplicate-at-import-rules.description: 禁止在样式表中使用重复的 @import 规则

no-duplicate-selectors.name: no-duplicate-selectors
no-duplicate-selectors.description: 禁止样式表中的重复选择器

no-invalid-double-slash-comments.name: no-invalid-double-slash-comments
no-invalid-double-slash-comments.description: 禁止使用 CSS 不支持并可能导致意外结果的双斜杠注释 (//...)

no-missing-end-of-source-newline.name: no-missing-end-of-source-newline
no-missing-end-of-source-newline.description: 禁止缺少源码结尾换行符

no-unknown-animation.name: no-unknown-animation
no-unknown-animation.badExample:
a { animation-name: fancy-slide; }
a { animation: fancy-slide 2s linear; }

number-leading-zero.name: number-leading-zero
number-leading-zero.description: 小于 1 的数值必须有一个前导零

number-max-precision.name: number-max-precision
number-max-precision.description: 数字中允许最大的小数位数为3位

property-no-vendor-prefix.name: property-no-vendor-prefix
property-no-vendor-prefix.description: 禁止属性使用浏览器引擎前缀

rule-empty-line-before.name: rule-empty-line-before
rule-empty-line-before.description: 在规则之前必须有空行

selector-attribute-brackets-space-inside.name: selector-attribute-brackets-space-inside
selector-attribute-brackets-space-inside.description: 属性选择器内的括号内禁止出现空格

selector-attribute-operator-space-after.name: selector-attribute-operator-space-after
selector-attribute-operator-space-after.description: 在运算符之后禁止出现空格

selector-attribute-operator-space-before.name: selector-attribute-operator-space-before
selector-attribute-operator-space-before.description: 在运算符之前禁止出现空格

selector-combinator-space-after.name: selector-combinator-space-after
selector-combinator-space-after.description: 在组合选择器之后必须有一个空格
selector-combinator-space-after.goodExample:
a + b { color: #000; }
a> b { color: #000; }

selector-combinator-space-before.name: selector-combinator-space-before
selector-combinator-space-before.description: 在组合选择器之前必须有一个空格
selector-combinator-space-before.goodExample:
a + b { color: #000; }
a> b { color: #000; }

selector-descendant-combinator-no-non-sp.name: selector-descendant-combinator-no-non-space
selector-descendant-combinator-no-non-sp.description: 禁止后代选择器使用非空格字符

selector-list-comma-newline-after.name: selector-list-comma-newline-after
selector-list-comma-newline-after.description: 选择器列表的逗号之后必须有换行符

selector-list-comma-newline-before.name: selector-list-comma-newline-before
selector-list-comma-newline-before.description: 选择器列表的逗号之前禁止有换行符

selector-list-comma-space-before.name: selector-list-comma-space-before
selector-list-comma-space-before.description: 在选择器列表的逗号之前禁止有空白符

selector-max-attribute.name: selector-max-attribute
selector-max-attribute.description: 一个选择器中属性选择器的最大数量为8

selector-max-class.name: selector-max-class
selector-max-class.description: 一个选择器中类的最大数量为8

selector-max-compound-selectors.name: selector-max-compound-selectors
selector-max-compound-selectors.description: 一个选择器中复合选择器的最大数量为8

selector-max-empty-lines.name: selector-max-empty-lines
selector-max-empty-lines.description: 选择器中最大相邻空行的数量为0

selector-max-id.name: selector-max-id
selector-max-id.description: 一个选择器中 ID 选择器的最大数量为5

selector-max-pseudo-class.name: selector-max-pseudo-class
selector-max-pseudo-class.description: 一个选择器中伪类的最大数量为8

selector-max-type.name: selector-max-type
selector-max-type.description: 一个选择器中类型选择器的最大数量为8

selector-max-universal.name: selector-max-universal
selector-max-universal.description: 一个选择器中通用选择器的最大数量为1

selector-pseudo-class-case.name: selector-pseudo-class-case
selector-pseudo-class-case.description: 伪类选择器必须为小写格式

selector-pseudo-class-no-unknown.name: selector-pseudo-class-no-unknown
selector-pseudo-class-no-unknown.description: 禁止未知的伪类选择器

selector-pseudo-class-parentheses-space-.name: selector-pseudo-class-parentheses-space-inside
selector-pseudo-class-parentheses-space-.description: 在伪类选择器内的括号内禁止出现空格

selector-pseudo-element-case.name: selector-pseudo-element-case
selector-pseudo-element-case.description: 伪元素选择器必须为小写格式

selector-pseudo-element-colon-notation.name: selector-pseudo-element-colon-notation
selector-pseudo-element-colon-notation.description: 伪元素指定必须为双冒号表示法

selector-pseudo-element-no-unknown.name: selector-pseudo-element-no-unknown
selector-pseudo-element-no-unknown.description: 禁止未知的伪元素选择器

selector-type-case.name: selector-type-case
selector-type-case.description: 类型选择器必须为小写格式

shorthand-property-no-redundant-values.name: shorthand-property-no-redundant-values
shorthand-property-no-redundant-values.description: 禁止简写属性的冗余值

string-no-newline.name: string-no-newline
string-no-newline.description: 禁止在字符串（未转义）换行

string-quotes.name: string-quotes
string-quotes.description: 指定字符串必须使用双引号

time-min-milliseconds.name: time-min-milliseconds
time-min-milliseconds.description: 指定时间值的最小毫秒数为100

unicode-bom.name: unicode-bom
unicode-bom.description: 关闭 Unicode 字节顺序标志

value-keyword-case'.name: value-keyword-case'
value-keyword-case'.description: 指定关键字的值的必须为小写

value-no-vendor-prefix.name: value-no-vendor-prefix
value-no-vendor-prefix.description: 禁止值的浏览器引擎前缀
value-no-vendor-prefix.goodExample:
a { display: flex; }
a { max-width: max-content; }

value-list-comma-newline-after.name: value-list-comma-newline-after
value-list-comma-newline-after.description: 在多行值列表的逗号之后必须有一个换行符

value-list-comma-newline-before.name: value-list-comma-newline-before
value-list-comma-newline-before.description: 在多行值列表的逗号之前禁止有换行符

value-list-comma-space-after.name: value-list-comma-space-after
value-list-comma-space-after.description: 在单行值列表的逗号之后必须有一个空格

value-list-comma-space-before.name: value-list-comma-space-before
value-list-comma-space-before.description: 在逗号之前禁止有空白符

value-list-max-empty-lines.name: value-list-max-empty-lines
value-list-max-empty-lines.description: 值列表中允许的最大相邻空行数量

plugin/declaration-block-no-ignored-prop.name: plugin/declaration-block-no-ignored-properties
plugin/declaration-block-no-ignored-prop.description: 禁止在同一规则中由于另一个属性值而忽略的属性值
plugin/declaration-block-no-ignored-prop.badExample:
a { display: inline; width: 100px; }
a { display: inline; height: 100px; }

plugin/z-index-value-constraint.name: plugin/z-index-value-constraint
plugin/z-index-value-constraint.description: 指定 z-index 的最小值为1，最大值为 100
